function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for wider adoption of UBPI in healthcare","Impact":"Increased usage can lead to greater exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to infection control measures and protocols","Technologies":"Virtual platforms for remote delivery of healthcare services","People":"Healthcare workers and patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Use of UBPI in limited resource settings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to limited resources","Mitigation":"Provision of adequate personal protective equipment and training in infection control","Technologies":"Innovative resource-efficient healthcare delivery technologies","People":"Healthcare workers and patients in limited resource settings","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and aid organizations"}]}
